ValidationRule.description: Need to add a provider before marking LOA as sent to provider
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(Provider_Name__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(MainLOAStatus__c,"Sent to Provider"), ISPICKVAL(MainLOAStatus__c,"Within SLA"), ISPICKVAL(MainLOAStatus__c,"Outside SLA"), ISPICKVAL(MainLOAStatus__c,"Specialist Reviewed") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You need to add a Provider
